definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: The best concentration of isopropanol in the mobile phase is 1%.
sentences.chinese: 流动相中异丙醇体积分数以1%为最佳。

sentences.english: Recovering isopropanol by simple distillation and phase separation with salt has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 采用普通精馏与加盐分相技术回收异丙醇。

sentences.english: The present invention is an improvement of dewaxing process of isopropanol and urea.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是对尿素异丙醇脱蜡过程的改进。

sentences.english: Use, such as isopropyl alcohol, methyl ethyl ketone, or alcohol solvent remove residual sealant.
sentences.chinese: 使用如异丙醇，丁酮或酒精等溶剂清除残留的密封胶。

sentences.english: Stay samples with clean after cooling isopropyl alcohol cleaning residue flux.
sentences.chinese: 待样品冷却后用干净的异丙醇清洗残留助焊剂。

sentences.english: A highly oriented mordenite membrane could be prepared with aluminum isopropoxide as the aluminum source.
sentences.chinese: 使用异丙醇铝为铝源能制得高度定向的丝光沸石膜。

sentences.english: This paper describes a method for determination of solvent residue in cefoperazone sodium for injection.
sentences.chinese: 建立了头孢哌酮粉针剂中残留溶媒异丙醇的测定方法。

sentences.english: Easy to absorb moisture and reacts with water into aluminium hydroxide and isopropanol.
sentences.chinese: 易吸湿，遇水分解成氢氧化铝和异丙醇。

sentences.english: No 2-propanol was detected in the waste liquid of normal distillation.
sentences.chinese: 常规蒸馏后排废液中未检出异丙醇。

sentences.english: Chemicals used in lithographic dampening solution in place of isopropyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 取代加在平版水槽液中异丙醇的化学物质。

sentences.english: After cooling, the excess hydride was destroyed by the dropwise addition of IPA.
sentences.chinese: 待冷却后，用外加物异丙醇滴定多余的氢化物。
